column1:
Orbitons8000,"2014-07-13T19:48:22.417Z","Squish Them!","

I think this is a very successful set as it captures what a real scorpion is like! Now, enough Gibba Gabba, let's squish them!
The box is very detailed, so I give it a 4.5/5. Instructions have nice advertisements so i give it a 4/5.
AMAZING! The parts are amazing! So many exculsive parts! Like the Scorpions Stinger! 5/5!
AWESOME! Scorm is the best though. Laval and Cragger are really good too. The Korroders are Amazing!  5/5!
Beautiful! Amazing model and look! Features are the best I've seen in any other sets! The pinching pinchers, the Korroders, the jointed tail, you can't go wrong with it!

,TRUE,5,5,5,5,5 brickman3","2014-12-20T16:08:03.24Z","Out of my way, heroes!","

This set is one of my favorites Chima sets. It comes with the all-exclusive Scorm, who of which is the king of the Scorpion tribe. He has special scorpion gold armor, which give him his stinger. Next there is the heroic Laval, prince of the Lion tribe. He comes in heavy silver armor, a jetpack, his new sword from his uncle, Lavertus, Black Valious, and a Chi shield. Finally, there is Cragger, the prince of the Crocodile tribe. He comes with heavy silver armor, and a giant blaster that I use sometimes as a jetpack for him. Now, for the pros and cons of the set.
Besides the two cons, I love this set!
